alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:11PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Training hunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and south central Gallatin Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking training thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Crescent Lake to 9 miles east of Lima. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monida, Raynolds Pass, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village and Targhee Pass. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 9 . Highway 191 between mile markers 4 and 10, and between mile markers 31 and 42. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Occasional cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
